Responsibility:

Brief Job Scope: The Buyer places and authorizes purchase orders within assigned limits. Expedites orders, tracks deliveries, resolves shipping errors, and maintains accurate records following established guidelines. 



  • Evaluate supplier quotes and services to determine most desirable suppliers.
  • Follow up with suppliers concerning order status and delivery and to all departments. 
  • Maintain accurate purchasing, pricing and cost data on applicable company systems. 
  • Ensure that all electronic data interchange, automated stock replenishment, and faxed orders reach the supplier. 
  • Review daily supplier shipping error notices and take appropriate action.
  • Review quarterly excess/obsolete inventory reports and negotiate with suppliers to obtain return goods authorizations on excess material.
  • Assist the Purchasing Manager with evaluating supplier performance related to on-time delivery, fill rates and errors, transfer cost improvements, branch support, and other measures.
  • Comply with company standard policies, procedures, internal audit and Sarbanes-Oxley controls, and quality control processes.
  • Understand and support ISO standards and support company procedures for document control, purchasing, process control, corrective and preventative action, and control of quality records. 


Qualification:



[Must]

About this Job



Job Highlight



  • Ø Opportunity to join one of the world's largest providers in telecommunications services.
  • Ø Opportunity to gain good welfare and well benefit
  • Ø Opportunity to develop your skills build brighter career path


 



Duties & Responsibility:



  • Ø Provide leadership to facility management team focusing on continuous improvement and management of tactical and strategic operational activities and supporting 99.99% or higher availability
  • Ø Oversee staff to ensure operational plans, policies, procedures are adhered to and are consistent with the overall goals and objectives
  • Ø Partner with other departments, customers and vendors to ensure the highest levels of 24x7 system availability and reliability to exceed defined Service Level Agreement
  • Ø Stay current on technological evolution and make recommendations for continuous system improvements and energy efficiency
  • Ø Maintain a high level of safety awareness and operations. Identify hazardous conditions and operations and recommend appropriate actions to correct or eliminate the hazards.
  • Ø Define, track and report on Key Performance Indicators for facility management operations
  • Ø Manage the operational relationships and negotiate service and maintenance agreements with vendors and service providers
  • Ø Mentor team members, and ensure that they are trained to keep the operations in a world class manner


 



Qualification:



[Must]



  • Thai Nationality, Male or Female, Age 30-40 years old.
  • Bachelor’s in Electrical Engineering or related fields.
  • At least 2 years’ experience in Data Center Facilities Engineering.
  • Knowledge of technical support of mechanical and electrical system infrastructure (e.g.building structures, electrical distribution systems, fire suppression systems, UPS, Diesel generators, Chiller, Building Management System, Physical security etc) and IT skills. (This role will have experience maintaining configuring and/or troubleshooting large scale infrastructure equipments in a Datacenter environment)
  • Good leadership and interpersonal skill
  • Good knowledge of written and spoken English


 [Preferble]



  • Possess service minded and problem solving skills
  • Fast learner, high responsibility, self-motivated, excellent team spirit and willing to work hard


 



Workplace Area:              Amata, Chonburi    



                       



Working Hour:                  Mon - Fri (8.30 – 17.30)  



 



About the Benefit



Salary: 50,000-70,000 THB/ Month      



- 2-3 months bonus



- Provident Fund



- Accidental and Health insurance



- Monetary assistance (Marriage, Funeral, Birth)



- Social Security Insurance



- Transportation Allowance



 



About the company



Corporate overview:



Our Client is one of the world's largest providers of telecommunications services. Headquartered in Tokyo, Japan, Our client was founded in 1999 and has subsidiaries and offices in 123 cities in 43 countries/regions around the world, with 20,400 employees worldwide.



Our client provides consultancy, architecture, security and cloud services to optimize the information and communications technology (ICT) environments of enterprises. These offerings are backed by the company’s worldwide infrastructure, including leading global tier-1 IP network, Arcstar Universal One™ VPN network reaching 196 countries/regions, and 130 secure data centers. Our client solutions leverage the global resources of their group companies.



Their leadership is well-recognized in the industry and has received numerous awards.



Industrial & Product:      Telecommunication/Networking

About this Job



Job Highlight



  • Opportunity to work in Taiwan’s long history and big well-known company.
  • Utilize your sale and engineering skill for the company.
  • Opportunity to join the big well known company setting up the business in Thailand.


 



Duties & Responsibility:



  • Visit clients and support clients via phone/emails.
  • Responsible for existing clients regarding product proposal, introduction, inventory management, maintenance support by using knowledge about the machine.
  • Develop new customer channels and markets that include both direct and indirect sales.


 



Qualification:



  • Male or Female, Thai Nationality age 24-28 years old
  • Bachelor's Degree in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering.
  • Technical Certifications.
  • Mechanical Engineering, Production, Maintenance & Installation of Machinery, Trouble Shooting.
  •  1+ years’ experience in the sales of machine tools.
  • Knowledge of tooling and application Fanuc and Siemens CNC controls.
  • Understanding of Process & Quality Control.
  • Analytical Skills, Ability to Work under Pressure, Communication
  • Computer Literacy: MS Office & Internet Application
  • Own car and is able to travel upcountry
  • Good command of English




     



    Workplace Area:              BTS Ploenchit 



                      



    Working Hour:                  09:00 – 17:00



     



    About the Benefit



    Salary: 25,000-50,000 THB/ Month      



    - Social Security Insurance



    - Medical Insurance



    - Provident Fund



    - Over Time: Working on public holiday (if necessary)



    - Transportation: Own car
    - Gasoline & Maintenance rate is THB. 5 - / Kilometer.
    - Toll way as per actual bill.           
    - Domestic:  If stay overnight THB. 800 - / night. Traveling abroad: As per company structure.



     



    About the company



    The company is a leading multi-divisional heavy industrial steel manufacturing company operating in diversified commercial industries. The company is headquartered in Taiwan. For over 60 years, the company has been offered groundbreaking products and services, from our award-winning machine tools to our tournament-winning golf shafts. They are excited to be entering the Thailand market. The company will provide the business of selling, marketing, distributing, and servicing machine tools within the Thailand market. They are looking for career oriented, highly motivated, enthusiastic, and talented individuals to join us in building company in this exciting industry and market.
    Industrial & Product:      Trading

About this Job

Job Highlight

Opportunity to work with one of the most versatile Japanese company 

Opportunity to extend your connection and build-up valuable network

Opportunity to extend your knowledge and know how about medical devices


Duties & Responsibility:

•Plan and prioritize sales activities with key customers towards achieving agreed business aims of Medical Systems.

•Develop and maintain consultative sales relationships with all customer buying influences within the key account’s organization by providing value-added solutions of Medical System portfolio

•Complete Quarterly business review, detailing all key account activity and strategies employed to assuring the attainment of sales goals.

•Maintain and develop relationship with key customers and building up strong relationship through appropriate propositions and ethical sales methods.

•Monitoring and report on market and competitor activities and product relevant key customers market analysis and market trends, and calculating potential impact and vulnerability of the key customers

•Using knowledge of the market and competitors, identify and develop the company’s unique selling propositions and differentiators

•Present and consult with management on business trends to set up strategy, market expanding and developing new key customers as align with products portfolio

•Forecast sales targets and ensure they are met by direct and indirect sales

•Submit monthly progress reports including market opportunity and ensure data is accurate   


Desired skills & experiences:


[Must]

Male or Female age not less than 37 years old, Thai Nationality

Bachelor Degree or Master Degree in Medical Technology or related filed

7 years’ work experience in Key Account Manager in medical device market, hospital channel or distribution related field with management level

Customer oriented with experience in negotiation and problem solving as well as motivation and leading a sales team.

Good command of written and spoken English is essential

Own transportation with a valid driving license and be able to travel either to upcountry or abroad when required 


[Prefer]

Proactive, well-organized, has can-do attitude, results driven

Professional, confident and resilient personality with the ability to build and maintain effective business relationships

English: Business Level

Working Hour:Mon - Fri (8.30 – 17.30)

Annual Income: 1,040,000 – 1,560,000 THB/ Year

(Work Outline) 

Modellers build three-dimensional computer models of everything that is needed for a CGI project. 

(Product) 

Japanese amusement machine [Pachinko] ‘s animations

 (Detail) 

The models they produce need to meet the creative requirements of the Production Designer and/or Art Director and/or client, but it is just as important that they should satisfy the technical needs of the CG department and be efficient, reliable, to scale and to be easy to rig and animate.

Further on in the process, Riggers will rig the models to enable them to be animated and Texture Artists will apply texture which will be further enhanced at the lighting stage when tone and depth are added.

It is important that Modellers understand what will be required of their models in the later stages of production because this can affect the work they produce. Information about this will be provided by a Director, Supervisor or Animator, or can be found in the storyboard or layouts. 

On smaller productions, Modellers may also rig, build textures and create lighting. On larger projects, they may be required to liaise with Riggers, Texture Artists and Lighters.

About this Job

Job Highlight

Willing to work Stable Big Leasing Company with good benefit.

Willing to have good career path and become strong power in the company.

Good Experience working for HRD & Training for Leasing/Finance Department before.

Duties & Responsibilities:

(*Work Outline) = Responsible for planning and implementing thorough HRD processes of people planning, performance management, on boarding training program, and Training which includes both individual and team development plan.

People Planning

Initiates the discussion on people planning in each department so as to translate the department strategies into people and organization agenda.

Works with the Management on the headcounts and consolidate the new headcounts of all departments to project headcounts of the total organization for budgeting.

Co-studies the HR analytics and co-design new survey to get right analytics to use for organization development. This is included data gathering and processing in collaboration with the other HR areas.

Training and Development

Initiates the discussion with Managers/ Management to identify training needs and development actions both individual and team.

Prepares the people data or HR analytics to support the people and organization discussion including follow up actions.

Organizes the training activities as planned and records all training activities.  

Follows up with the managers on IDP action implementation and proactively supports to ensure the IDP implementation is done effectively.

Performance Management

Reviews and proposes the performance management process and tools to achieve the process improvement and support the organization for the robust, fair, and simple performance review.

Manages and follows up with the performance review for probationary period, mid-year performance review, and annual performance. This includes the performance review data maintenance for management reporting.

Ensures that all functions conduct the performance review according to the process and timeline.

On Boarding Training Program

liaises with the Recruitment section in order to develop the On-Boarding program to ensure new comers learns the business, process, and people faster according to their roles. Ultimately he/she develops the program to achieve the new comers’ engagement at the beginning of their career.  

Implements the On Boarding program as planned.

Continuously reviews the program to identify areas for continuous improvement.

HR Project 

Leads or support HR projects as assigned. Projects include but are not limited to performance management, development, people planning, or on boarding program.

Assists in developing the HR team members of all HR functions.

Leads the Insight Survey or any other survey for the development of the organization, the HR vision, and company strategies and vision.


Qualification:

Desired skills & experiences:

[Must]

Thai Nationality, Male/Female, Age 31-37 *Negotiable.

Bachelor Degree or higher degree in HR/ Organization Development or related fields (Oversea Universities are preferable!)

At least 3 years’ experience in HRD (Human Resource Development) 

Strong experience in Organization Development and be able to initiate the new HRD plan for the company.

Good Command in English (Business Level is a MUST!)

(Preferable)

Experience being HRD in Big corporate (Especially for International Company).

English: Business Level (*Communicate with HQ and Management Team)

Job Highlight

•Opportunity to work in one of the most well-known Japanese corporate banking

•Have strong financial modeling skill , Cash flow projection skill

•Willing to learn, Good service-minded, CAN DO attitude and Good in interpersonal and analytical skill.

•Good in English skills, especially in Business English.

•Computer literacy in MS Office; Excel, Power Point, Word.


[Prefer]

Have analytical and Communication skills / Bloomberg and of Reuters skills are advantage. 

Have passed CFA Level 1 is a plus (CFA is Chartered Financial Analyst)

JobListing.JobFullDescription:
Job brief


We are looking for a reliable accounting manager to supervise, monitor and evaluate all day-to-day accounting activities. Accounting manager responsibilities include establishing financial status by developing and implementing systems for collecting, analyzing, verifying and reporting financial information.


Responsibilities


    Manage and oversee the daily operations of the accounting department

    Process month and end year process, accounts payable/receivable, cash receipts, general ledger, payroll and utilities, treasury, budgeting, cash forecasting, revenue and expenditure variance analysis, capital assets reconciliations, trust account statement reconciliations, check runs, fixed asset activity, debt activity etc

    Monitor and analyse accounting data and produce financial reports or statements

    Establish and enforce proper accounting methods, policies and principles

    Coordinate and complete annual audits

    Provide recommendations

    Improve systems and procedures and initiate corrective actions

    Assign projects and direct staff to ensure compliance and accuracy

    Meet financial accounting objectives

    Establish and maintain fiscal files and records to document transactions


Requirements


    Proven working experience as Accounting Manager

    Advanced computer skills on MS Office, accounting software and databases

    Ability to manipulate large amounts of data

    Proven knowledge of accounting principles, practices, standards, laws and regulations

    High attention to detail and accuracy

    Ability to direct and supervise

Job Highlight

Opportunities to work in Japanese leading company in Human Resource industry

Opportunities to make strong organization by developing HR Training and whole hiring flow.

Since company is under expansion, there are much opportunities to challenge a wide range of duties

Responsible for all functions relating to Human Resources

Developing and revising employment program and benefit to be better

Revise company rule to make more good organization

Makes recommendations for changes to existing policies to ensure compliance with new or proposed regulations. 

Investigates and responds to disciplinary matters. 

Developing effective relationships with the business to promote good employee rela-tions across the organization. 



Desired skills & experiences:

Male or Female, Thai Nationality, Age 28－35 years old.

Bachelor Degree or higher in any related field

Good command of written and spoken in English (TOEIC score 750 as minimum) 

At least 5 year experience which is related to HRD

Good computer literacy (MS office/ Word/PowerPoint) 

Able to work under pressure & work hard 

Have a high responsibility for work

[Prefer]

Good personality and Interpersonal skills 

Good command in Japanese is advantage

Able to working OT. (If needed)

English: Advanced Conversation Level
